nz.co.gofetch.railways.algorithm

Class ShortestRouteCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.co.gofetch.railways.algorithm.ShortestRouteCalculator

  • public class ShortestRouteCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    this class provides methods to calculate shortest path between two stations e.g. A and C

    • Method Detail

      • shortestJourney

        public static Journey shortestJourney(Railway railway,
                                      java.lang.String start,
                                      java.lang.String end)
                               throws RailwayException,
                                      UserInputException
        calculates shortest path between two stations
        Parameters:
        railway - configuration
        start - station id
        end - station id
        Returns:
        journey - shortest path between start and end stations
        Throws:
        UserInputException - - when search conditions are not valid/empty
        RailwayException - - railway is not configured or start/end stations do not exist on the railway

      • addDummyStationToRailway

        private static void addDummyStationToRailway(Railway railway,
                                             Station dummyStation,
                                             Station originalStation)
        adds a dummy station to the railway
        Parameters:
        railway - configuration
        dummyStation - - dummyStation to be added
        originalStation - - originalStation from where a dummy station was copied station id

      • removeDummyStation

        private static void removeDummyStation(Railway railway,
                                       Station dummyStation)
        removes a dummy station from the railway
        Parameters:
        railway - configuration
        dummyStation - - dummyStation to be added

      • createJourney

        private static Journey createJourney(Railway railway,
                                     Station start,
                                     java.lang.String end)
                              throws RailwayException
        creates a journey based on Dijkstra calculations
        Parameters:
        railway - configuration
        start - station
        end - station id
        Returns:
        journey - shortest path between start and end stations
        Throws:
        RailwayException - - as journey is created from end station - if it doesn't end up in a start station

      • calculateDijkstraAlg

        private static void calculateDijkstraAlg(Railway railway,
                                         Station start)
        implementation of Dijkstra's algorithm
        Parameters:
        railway - configuration
        start - station
